website_summaries.verdict: Use this versatile pan to poach your favorite flounder and roast a filet.
pros: Stainless steel high dome roaster with roasting rack and steaming rack
High sides, so liquid won't spill

customer_reviews.title: Never have to deal with rust on pans
customer_reviews.text: Looks great,I can't complain,lid has vents to release moisture great deal,thanks
customer_reviews.author: Earl G.

customer_reviews.title: Good roaster for the price
customer_reviews.text: I consider this a light duty roaster but what I wanted was the poaching feature. I used it for pastrami and it worked great. Lined the poacher with foil so clean up was easy. Did the job at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Roasting Pan
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this, and look forward to our next turkey!
customer_reviews.author: George T. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a stainless steel roaster for Thanksgiving (10-12lb bird). This served the purpose perfectly and at a good price. Have only used it once, so cannot comment on durability, but appears to be of solid quality. Very pleased with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and works very well at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. May

customer_reviews.title: Tarnished after first use!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine tarnished too after one use!! I tried bon ami cleanser that usually gets it off but it didn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: FrancescaB

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected. But nice pan easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M.

customer_reviews.title: bad product, lies, false advertising
customer_reviews.text: This roaster was bad in every respect! The parts to open & close the vents were missing. So the gaping holes looked like hell, and the advertised size (23lb) was a joke, I bought a 20lb turkey for thanksgiving, and the day before discivered it was WAY to small to fit this smaller than advertised so I had to scramble, finding the right size roaster, also advertised as 23ld size at a local hardware store in enameled steel. It was MUCH LARGER!!! On the shelf next to it was a 15lb roaster the same size as the cook pro "23lb" roaster. TOTAL false advertising!!!
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm often nervous with deals that seem too good to be true, but this turned out very well. The metal isn't super thick, but it's durable if you aren't slamming it around trying to tenderize meat with it like a cave person. It washes up very nicely in the dishwasher, which is a must for me. It holds a nice sized roast plus vegetables and looks good enough to serve from with company. I can't really think of any complaints. It fits in perfectly with my more expensive stainless cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rybolt

customer_reviews.title: Will hold a SMALL turkey.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a 20 pound turkey but there's no way a turkey larger than 16# will fit in it... Maybe not even that. Also, it's very thin stainless steel. But the price was super low, so I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Rweed

customer_reviews.title: Amesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad we bought this. It works great and it's well made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it yet but looking forward to cooking in a nice stainless steel roaster instead of an old aluminum one
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to use it yet but looking forward to cooking in a nice stainless steel roaster instead of an old aluminum one.
customer_reviews.author: Pookiekat

product_meta.title: Cook Pro All-in-1 Stainless High Dome Roaster and Fish Poacher, 23-Pound
product_meta.description: An essential piece of cookware for family dinners, parties and holiday celebrations, the high dome, quality stainless steel roaster with roasting rack is designed to hold a turkey, chicken, or large roast. Riveted stainless steel handles make placing the roaster into the oven and lifting it out, safe and easy. Also includes a steamer plate which doubles as a fish poacher. Can hold up to 23lbs of product.
feature_bullets: The high dome, quality stainless steel roaster with roasting rack is designed to hold a small to medium sized turkey, chicken, or large roast
Riveted stainless steel handles make placing the roaster into the oven and lifting it out, safe and easy
Also includes a steamer plate and doubles as a fish poacher
The measurements are 16.75" x 12.25" x 7" (Roaster), 14.25" x 8.5" (Roasting Rack) and 13.5" x 9.5" x 3.25" (Steamer Rack)
An essential piece of cookware for family dinners, parties and holiday celebrations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
